artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,256); woman at left in a yellow and white striped gown, white gloves, a light greenish/yellow muff, and a red and white hat with white plumes; man in center in blue breeches, long coral-colored vest, and a yellow and green striped coat holding a black hat and a gray muff with a red bow; woman at right in a blue and white striped gown with a red sash around her waist, a yellow muff with an orange bow, and a pink hat with white ribbon and bows
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Troisiéme Cahier, 10 Décembre 1787
